text: Increased expression of GRP78, GRP94 and other ER stress related genes has been determined in cells infected with various coronaviruses. These include mouse hepatitis virus (MHV), severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus (SARS-CoV) and infectious bronchitis virus (IBV) [18] [19] [20] . Activation of ER stress response can be also detected in cell overexpressing the SARS-CoV spike protein [21, 22] , protein 3a [23] , protein 6 [24] , protein 8a, and protein 8b [25] .
